name: The 2nd International Conference on Research in Psychology
content: The 2nd International Conference on Research in Psychology, June 03â€“05, 2022 in Oxford, UK aims to bring together academia, researchers, and scholars to exchange information and share experiences and research results about all aspects of specialized and interdisciplinary fields. This Psychology Conference provides an opportunity for all to network, share ideas and present their research to a worldwide community. Discussion on the latest innovations, trends and practical concerns, and challenges faced in these fields are also encouraged. ICRPCONF is supported by many universities, organizations, and scientific communities throughout the world. With this conference, we encourage the community of multinational researchers to share common experiences and discussions.
